title: Andrew's practice R lesson
text: Andrew MacDonald will practice teaching introductory R, preparing for a SWC workshop at SFU

title: Introduction to R
text: Evan Morien will give a guided introduction to first steps in R - great for first-time R users!

text: Bill Mills will introduce Git - suitable for first-time Git users!

text: We're meeting up at SFU to discuss starting Study Group events there.

text: Come learn about the game-changing libraries dplyr and magrittr!

text: Erica Acton will give a guided intro to the knitr package and R markdown! (for beginners)

title: Making graphics with the ggplot2 library
text: Jeff Stafford will explain how to create good-looking plots using ggplot2.

title: Our first ever R study group work-along!
text: Hang out and work on our individual R projects along side each other

text: How to loop, not loop, and speed loops up

title: Watch live Rstudio webinar
text: Live webinar (on projector) of Hadley Wickham talking about getting data into R

title: Using R for creating open, repeatable State of Environment indicators
text: Steph Hazlitt from Environment BC will be visiting to introduce their recently released environmental open data and R code.

title: Creating your own packages and objects
text: Jeff Stafford will cover how to create packages using the devtools library as well as object-oriented programming in R

title: Lattice Vs ggplot2

text: Come hang out for some cookies and R

title: Phylogenetic comparative analyses in R, Part 1
